page.title: 12GAMES PLAYED AT KIRKCOWAN
page.content: We play many types of{chasing games}at school such as TV Tiggy,Line Tiggy,Shadow Tiggy and Shepherd's Pie.Here is how to play Underground Tiggy.To select the catchers or{Tigger and{Guard}we put our feet in a circle and say a rhyme such as:- "Mickey Mouse built a house, You are not IT." The last two are IT.The people caught by TIGGER stand with one hand against the wall, gaurded by the GUARD until freed by another player who runs under the arm to do so without being caught himself.The running under the arm gives the game its name.Other names for this game is Scarecrow Tiggy and Stick in the Mud. Chain Tiggy is another chasing game where the catchers join hands.
